Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: CONCLUSIONS : High - dose daptomycin may be an alternative option for MSSA bacteremia with or without a CNS source in patients who have failed or cannot tolerate standard therapy .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| MSSA bacteremia |
| CNS source |

In this paragraph, "MSSA bacteremia" refers to a bacterial infection in the bloodstream caused by Methicillin-Susceptible Staphylococcus aureus (MSSA), and "CNS source" refers to a central nervous system infection.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| MSSA bacteremia |

In this paragraph, "MSSA bacteremia" is the only entity that clearly refers to a disease. The term "CNS source" is not a disease itself, but rather a descriptor of the possible location of the infection. Therefore, it should not be included in the table.
